Text.Text: Heh, you're one of those sell-swords from Luskan, aren't you?  As it happens, so am I... say, look, friend, you got anything to keep the chill outta my bones?  I'm in need of a spot, and some ale would do nicely.
Piss off, then.  Some brother in arms *you* are.
Piss off, then.  Some sister in arms *you* are.
Eh... no harm meant.  Slipped off my tongue is all - a hundred apologies, alright?
Aye, aye - I'm off.  We'll just keep it between you n' me, then, alright - 'bout the drink?  Aye?
Ye're not going to report me, are ye?
Kind of you, friend - I'd be appreciative of that, I would.  We sell-swords have to stick together, y'know?
Pah, that stuff gives me the runs.   I was hopin' you might have some wine or brandy on you.
Pah, I said something to warm the bones, not kill me!  I was, eh, hopin' you might have some wine or brandy on you.
Give you three gold for it.  More than it's worth!
Wh- that's robbery, so it is!  I could get a better deal from the goblins!
All right, then.  Thank you - this'll warm the gut, it will.
All right, all right!  Here you are.
You chance upon a bottle yet, friend?  A slow kind of chill is creeping into my bones, and eh, some wine would turn things right around, it would.
What do *you* want?  Change yer mind about that bottle?
Many th-th-thanks for the bottle, friend, heh... it, eh, heh-heh, warmed the insides g-g-good, it did.
Heh - yez.  Yez I did... to arms!  To arms!  HA!  Let the goblinz come - I'm ready for 'em.
When those goblins attacked, I thought we were done for - thanks for keeping me away from the bottle.  Right now, though, I need a drink.

I... I was half out of my skull when those goblins attacked... I was worse than useless.  A lot of my friends in my mercenary company were killed by goblins, and I... I was too drunk to do anything but watch.  What a fool I am!
What?!  There's goblins about, so whatever you need, it can wait!
Heh - to arms!  To arms!  Heh-heh - whozat?  Whattya want, eh?  Gotsch any more wine for ol' Niles, doya?
HA!  Let the goblinz come - I'm ready for 'em ALL!  HA-HA!
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers on the field.  Get back to your post.
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers.  Get back to your post.
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
I happen to have some Berduskan Black Brew, but it'll cost you.
How about some braehg?  That'll keep you warm, fermented boar's milk and all.
Don't have anything on me, but I could scrounge you up something.
Can't help you.  Farewell.
Perhaps you don't think I was serious about you reporting to your post.  That somehow Targos' safety isn't something that I take seriously.
*What* did you just say?  I've about had it with people with sharp tongues around here.
I suggest you change your tone and start stammering out an apology or you'll be lying in a pool of your own blood.
Yeah, and I'd want you watching my back in a fight, too.  Farewell and good riddance.
Perhaps you don't think I was serious about you reporting to your post.  That somehow Targos' safety isn't something that I take seriously.
*What* did you just say?  I've about had it with people with sharp tongues around here.
I suggest you change your tone and start stammering out an apology or you'll be lying in a pool of your own blood.
Yeah, and I'd want you watching my back in a fight, too.  Farewell and good riddance.

I was willing to excuse your behavior as simple fatigue, but if you choose to drink yourself into a stupor while goblins threaten Targos, I'll see to it your contract is revoked and you are relieved of duty.  Now *report to your post.*  We've got a battle to win.

I was willing to let your behavior go and let you rot here, but now... if I even hear of you touching a drop of alcohol while goblins threaten Targos, I'll see to it you're punished.  Now *report to your post.*  We've got a battle to win.

I was willing to let your behavior go and let you rot here, but now... if I even hear of you touching a drop of alcohol while on my watch, I'll gut you myself.  Now *report to your post.*  We've got a battle to win.
Apology accepted.  Farewell.
Just be watchful for goblins... and stay off the bottle.
Just be watchful for goblins... and stay off the bottle.
You're right about that.  Farewell.
Look, you're probably better off without any wine swimming through your head when the goblins attack.
Look, you're probably better off without any wine swimming through your head when the goblins attack.
I do - how much is it worth to you?
I do - how much is it worth to you?
I'll see if I can go round some up.  Someone's got to have a bottle around here.
Can't help you, then.  Farewell.
Look, you're probably better off without any wine swimming through your head when the goblins attack.
Look, you're probably better off without any wine swimming through your head when the goblins attack.
I do - how much is it worth to you?
I do - how much is it worth to you?
I'll see if I can go round some up.  Someone's got to have a bottle around here.
Can't help you, then.  Farewell.
All right.
All right.
*Three gold?*  No... five is more to my liking.
How about ten?
I was thinking fifteen.
Maybe we'll do business some other time when you have more gold.
Maybe we'll do business some other time when you have more gold.
All right, three gold, then.
All right, three gold, then.
I *said* five, and I *meant* five.
I *said* five, and I *meant* five.
I said ten, and I meant ten.
I said ten, and I meant ten.
I said fifteen, and I meant fifteen.
I said fifteen, and I meant fifteen.
Oh, did I say fifteen?  Now it's *twenty.*
Oh, did I say fifteen?  Now it's *twenty.*
You're welcome to ask the goblins, then.  Farewell.
You're welcome to ask the goblins, then.  Farewell.
Don't drink it all at once - don't know when Targos will get a new shipment.  Farewell.
Don't drink it all at once - don't know when Targos will get a new shipment.  Farewell.
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers on the field.  Get back to your post.
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers.  Get back to your post.
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
I happen to have some Berduskan Black Brew, but it'll cost you.
How about some braehg?  That'll keep you warm, fermented boar's milk and all.
Still looking.  Farewell.
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers on the field.  Get back to your post.
Look, the goblins could attack any second, and the last thing we need are drunk soldiers.  Get back to your post.
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
Sure, I've got a bottle.  What's it worth to you?
I happen to have some Berduskan Black Brew, but it'll cost you.
How about some braehg?  That'll keep you warm, fermented boar's milk and all.
Don't have anything on me, but I could scrounge you up something.
Can't help you.  Farewell.
Did you polish off that *whole* bottle?
My pleasure.  Watch yourself.
Uh... just stay away from the battle lines, friend.  Farewell.
I'd hold off on the ale until we're sure the region is secure, Niles.  Farewell.
Nothing can be done for your friends now, Niles.  Take this incident as a lesson, and keep off the drink in the future.
All right, then.  Watch yourself.
Get a hold of yourself, Niles!  There's goblins about!
I don't have time for this - farewell.
